CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Considering the sufficiently high I SC values of this system , more promising photovoltaic performance is thought to be achievable by using other fullerene derivatives with high LUMO energy levels , such as bis-PCBM 13 or Lu3N @ C80 - PCBH.

Let's think step by step.

1. "fullerene derivatives"
2. "bis-PCBM 13"
3. "Lu3N @ C80 - PCBH"

These are the material names mentioned in the paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| fullerene derivatives |
| bis-PCBM 13 |
| Lu3N @ C80 - PCBH |

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Considering the sufficiently high I SC values of this system , more promising photovoltaic performance is thought to be achievable by using other fullerene derivatives with high LUMO energy levels , such as bis-PCBM 13 or Lu3N @ C80 - PCBH.

Let's think step by step.

1. I SC values - This is a "Property Name" entity. ISC refers to Intensity-Scaled Counting, which is a method used in photovoltaic performance measurement.
2. high LUMO energy levels - This is a "Property Name" entity. LUMO stands for Lowest Unoccupied Molecular Orbital, which is a property of a molecule that describes the energy level of the highest electron orbit that is not occupied by an electron.
3. bis-PCBM 13 - This is not a "Property Name" entity. It is a specific type of fullerene derivative.
4. Lu3N @ C80 - PCBH - This is not a "Property Name" entity. It is a specific type of fullerene derivative.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. I SC values
2. high LUMO energy levels

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| I SC values |
| high LUMO energy levels |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Considering the sufficiently high I SC values of this system , more promising photovoltaic performance is thought to be achievable by using other fullerene derivatives with high LUMO energy levels , such as bis-PCBM 13 or Lu3N @ C80 - PCBH.

Let's think step by step.

1. I SC values: ISC (Intersystem Crossing) is a property value in the context of photovoltaic performance.
2. high LUMO energy levels: LUMO (Lowest Unoccupied Molecular Orbital) energy levels are property values related to fullerene derivatives.

So, the "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are:

* I SC values
* high LUMO energy levels
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. I SC values
2. high LUMO energy levels

These are the entities that clearly refer to the Value of Material Property in the paragraph.

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| --- |

| high LUMO energy levels |
